name: feint
description: A game engine for crafting 2D games in Haxe
author: Kenny Goff

scripts.samples:hello-feint: cd samples/hello-feint && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
scripts.samples:brick-breaker: cd samples/brick-breaker && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
scripts.samples:forge-ecs: cd samples/forge-ecs && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
scripts.samples:sprites: cd samples/sprites && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
scripts.samples:overload: cd samples/overload && haxe compile.hxml && open build/web/index.html
